name: simple
description: Basic fund scenario with two-stage allocation (pre-seed and seed)
assumptions: 60 pre-seed investments at $500K average check (30% allocation)
47 seed investments at $1.5M average check (70% allocation)
Pre-seed follow-on reserves: 25% of initial allocation
Seed follow-on reserves: 35% of initial allocation
2% annual management fee on committed capital
Single exit event at month 84 (year 7) with 2.5x TVPI

tolerances.description: 1e-6 for both absolute and relative differences (6-decimal precision)

author: System
